comprehensive_overview: hipify-clang is a tool that translates CUDA code to HIP (Heterogeneous-Compute Interface for Portability) code, enabling the porting of CUDA applications to AMD GPUs.
core_features:
1. Translates CUDA source code to HIP source code.
2. Facilitates the migration of CUDA applications to AMD GPUs.
3. Helps in leveraging the performance of AMD GPUs for existing CUDA projects.
